description.value:
Whether it's because you play especially vigorously or are simply off-key, the music of your belly drum can physically wound your foes. You deal @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2))d4[sonic]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30], with a @Check[fortitude|against:class-spell|basic] save equal to your spell DC or class DC, whichever is higher. Such vigorous drumming does leave your belly a bit sore, though, preventing you from using this ability again for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

At 15th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d4.
